abstract: This week, Volkswagen is expected to announce that it is offering cash to owners of diesel cars in the U.S., thousands of Greek workers may walk off the job and consumer data will be released.
snippet: This week, Volkswagen is expected to announce that it is offering cash to owners of diesel cars in the U.S., thousands of Greek workers may walk off the job and consumer data will be released.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Volkswagen is expected to announce that it is offering cash to the owners of diesel cars in the United States as it steps up its effort to recover some of the good will it lost after admitting that the vehicles were programmed to cheat on emissions tests.

headline.main: VW Announcement, a Strike Planned in Greece and Retail Data
